title: burenka
author: burenka
created_time: July 13, 2022, 07:22:32 PMLast edit: July 14, 2022, 06:06:23 AM by burenka
content: Greetings, I'm data40.com founder, and acting analyst & marketing specialist. I've been working in Gaming/Gambling areas since 2008. In 2017 year I've come closer to blockchain projects topics, and in 2019 I dived into VC business.My team is willing to help you with analytics and marketing surveys operations. Most commonly we conduct private marketing searches and venture-project analysis and forecasting/estimates. Also, we have packages of ready-to-run services, like Competitive analysis or Deep Product Niche review. We work on the out-staff model, which means a transparent and measurable work log with payments based on hour rates and hour-loads.We are specialized in areas:Game Development Industry, Online GamesGambling, iGaming, Gabmling TechVenture Capital, Venture AnalyticsBlockchain Ventures, Project AnalyticsCommon ServicesSmart handsCompetitor Research SurveyVenture AnalysisDataset developingDatamarket developingCustom SurveyProduct SurveyBulk CommunicationsData-Driven MarketingOutstaff team on demandThe key product is "private survey/project", private means that task have single client, who forms a survey-project specific goals and targets, my team creates a project evaluation/estimation and method, then conducting work and data garthering, structuing and data processing. And in the end all data results will be yours, private, not published anywhere else. Price per hour depend on tier of each task, actual (7/13/2022) below, and aways actual on page https://data40.com/prices/CategoryDescriptionPrice per hour, USDtier 1Collecting information on a simple script or algorithm$4.9tier 2Search, facilitation, collection and structuring of information$6.9tier 3Information analysis$11.8tier 4Coordination, tasks, management work$11.8tier 5Client work$11.8tier 6Personal meetings with clients, sales, negotiations$13.8tier 7Conducting a sociological or expert interview in live mode$13.8tier 8Editorial work, Senior analyst$18.9tier 9Product analyst, product concepts$18.9tier 10Tech Development, Marketing Production$33.8There are some "premium" surveys avaiable on website, ready-to-buy and download: micro-datasets and lists, you can check them at page https://data40.com/buy-data/ All payments and transactions can be done in cryptocurrenices. Contact me in DM or via other contacts https://data40.com/contact/

comments.body: Catalogue of ready-to-download datasets & surveys. Prices vary: starting at $10-100 per simple datasets and data lists, and up to $500-1500 per complete-pack surveys.Blockchain & Cryptocurrencies:Blockchain Events and Expos Calendar 2022-2023 (327 events)Crypto Payment Aggregators List of Q2 2022 (103 units)Cryptocurrency and NFT Websites and Social Media Accounts of Q1 2022 (pack, 6668 units)YouTube Cryptocurrency and NFT accounts Q1 2022 (890 units)Cryptocurrency and NFT Websites Q1 2022 (1080 units)Facebook Cryptocurrency and NFT accounts Q1 2022 (443 units) Instagram Cryptocurrency and NFT accounts Q1 2022 (954 units)Twitter Cryptocurrency and NFT accounts Q1 2022 (3292 units)Crypto and gambling advertising platforms 2021 (584 units)Blockchain Events 2020-2021 CalendarGambling, Betting & CasinosPayment Aggregators for Gambling Q2 2022 (64 units)List of sites with Fantasy Sport 2021 (130 units)Live roulettes in gambling overview Q4 2020 (1016 casinos & 213 types, complete pack)Payment Services and Aggregators for Gambling 2020 (174+69 units)Crypto and gambling advertising platforms 2021 (584 units)Venture Capital Video games investment funds Q1 2020 (compete pack)Video Games & Game DevelopmentGaming Events and Expos Calendar 2022-2023 (614 units)List of Anti-Cheat systems Q2 2022 (419 units)List of Play-to-Earn Games 2021 (596 units)CS:GO tournament operators 2021 List of sites with CS:GO casinos 2021 (91 units)2019-2021 PC & Consoles Shooter Game Genre Overview (1400+ units, complete pack)Game development studios in Europe and the CIS Q1 2020 (2000+ units, complete pack)Video games investment funds Q1 2020 (complete pack)There is some Free Data available to download without any restrictions.There is a way more raw data, more than 200k units, like for example top 4000 casinos list, 25k online game industry website and sources. Full list of all datasets available on demand for specific query.

comments.author: burenka
comments.body: Just released new package: Gaming Events and Expos Calendar 2022-2023. Price $10 per. It contains 614 events dedicated to the gaming industry. The study includes data on gaming events featuring the latest and most prominent video games. Events and expos listed in this study will include speeches and lectures by industry professionals: programmers and developers, artists and designers, publishers and distributors, marketing and advertising specialists, as well as many others.Event research was carried out through open sources using the following search methods: Open search on Google, Bing.For ease of comparison, the information gathered is grouped by the following criteria: Dates; Location; Country; Online participation options; Type.Short InsightsWe have found 614 events dedicated to the gaming industry:556 events taking place in 2022;51 events announced for 2023;7 events that are yet to declare a specific date;Events taking place in 39 countries, excluding online events;Events held in 300 cities, excluding online events;The collected events are held on varying days of the week:124 events (20.20%) are held on weekdays without extending to Saturday and Sunday;461 events (75.08%) take place on weekends, i.e. Saturday or Sunday;29 event (4.72%) did not yet set an exact date.The listed events are further divided by the month they take place in:January - 18 detected events;February - 34 detected events;March - 45 detected events;April - 48 detected events;May - 31 detected events;June - 117 detected events;July - 116 detected events;August - 51 detected events;September - 49 detected events;October - 47 detected events;November - 35 detected events;December - 15 detected events.

comments.body: New Dataset avaiable: List of ICE London 2020 vs 2022 Exhibitors; (428 units)Research Goals and ObjectivesICE London 2020-2022 exhibitor review;Traffic and field of activity data collection;Exhibition data comparison for the two specified years.

comments.author: burenka
comments.body: New Dataset available: The list of the TOP 400 Gambling Websites of 2022Research Goals and ObjectivesCollecting a list of Gambling Websites;Highlighting the top 400 websites by traffic;Describing the extended features of the collected Gambling Websites.Short InsightsThe websites revealed during the present study have the following features:374 websites provide information about their available licenses;233 websites provide information about their Android/iOS mobile application;224 websites provide some form of a welcoming bonus: free spins, deposit percentage, cash bonus for replenishment, etc.;126 websites have a blog or their own news feed;65 websites provide information about available cryptocurrency payment options.Cumulative information on licensees and licensors:374 websites hold one or several licenses;85 websites hold licenses from general and regional licensors;The licensor could not be determined despite the presence of data on the existence of a license for a total of 27 websites;2 websites were found to have a combination of license types: open and indefinite.

comments.author: Bayan_D40
comments.created_time: June 05, 2023, 06:10:06 AMLast edit: June 05, 2023, 09:27:31 AM by Bayan_D40
comments.body: We have published new research: iGaming Events and Expos 2023 Calendar. Price $100.The dataset provided comprises details on 155 global gambling events scheduled for the year 2023. It encompasses information about the event's location, date, and event type.Event research was carried out through open sources using the following search methods: Open search on Google, Bing. Information about the location and dates is collected from websites and pages of events.For ease of comparison, the information gathered is grouped by the following criteria: Dates; Location; Country; Online participation options; Type.Short InsightsFound 155 events dedicated to the iGaming industry:Collected events take place in 46 countries, excluding online events;Collected events are held in 92 cities, excluding online events.The collected events are concentrated on different days of the event:82 events are held on weekdays without affecting Saturday and Sunday;16 events take place on Saturday or Sunday;57 events take place on weekdays and weekends.The listed events are further divided by the month they take place in:January - 48 detected events;February - 27 detected events;March - 23 detected events;April - 12 detected events;May - 9 detected events;June - 9 detected events;July - 8 detected events;August - 5 detected events;September - 4 detected events;October - 4 detected events;November - 4 detected events;December - 2 detected events.This dataset holds immense potential for various applications, including but not limited to analyzing trends within the gambling industry, pinpointing sponsorship and advertising prospects, and facilitating travel arrangements for players.

comments.author: Bayan_D40
comments.body: Experience the convenience of our iGaming event calendar, neatly packaged and ready for your use. Inside each calendar-event there is a link to the event/report website, date and location, details, and other useful information. Here, you'll find: All gaming B2B events;Publication dates of IR reports from top 40 iGaming companies.This format, crafted after careful consideration, offers unparalleled convenience compared to traditional super tables. Best of all, it is completely free, without registration or any unnecessary steps. Access the information you need with ease.
